title: Strengthening Leadership Competencies: Qualitative Improvement of Patient Advisory and Liaison Services (PALS)

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can describe at least three core roles of PALS services using qualitative research methods (interview analysis).
Learners can present at least two operational barriers of PALS from an organizational learning perspective.
Learners can propose at least one improvement plan for PALS based on case data collected in a mobile environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
